wikipedia_page.main: Leon Charles Jeanne (born 17 November 1980) is a Welsh former professional footballer. He began his career with Queens Park Rangers before joining his hometown team Cardiff City. However, he suffered from drug and alcohol addiction and was given a two-year suspended ban by the Football Association of Wales after testing positive for a class A drug. Continued disciplinary problems eventually led to his release from Cardiff. He later played for numerous clubs in the Welsh Premier League and lower divisions. And at the moment is in police custody for class A drug dealing.
